texts.paragraph: We tend to use passive voice when describing processes because we want to focus attention on the action. You should use passive voice appropriately in reports that describe flow chart, but don't overdo it! You do not have to make every verb passive and remember that some verbs, for example, intransitive verbs such as 'sleep', do not have a passive form.
